notes.title: First Meeting
notes.content: Met at the coffee shop downtown. Really nice person, we talked about work and hobbies.

notes.title: Emergency Contact
notes.content: Can be reached at work number during business hours. Backup emergency contact.

notes.title: Birthday Reminder
notes.content: Birthday is in March. Likes chocolate cake and outdoor activities.

notes.title: Personal Note
notes.content: Has two kids and a dog. Lives in the suburbs. Enjoys hiking on weekends.
